        <p>The AP-LS Award for Distinguished Contributions to Psychology and Law honors one who has made distinguished theoretical, empirical and/or applied contributions to the field of psychology and law. This award is not exclusively for AP-LS members, and anyone who meets these criteria may be nominated for the award.
